metadata.title: CVE-2017-15736 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability (stored) in SPIP before 3.1.7allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted string, as demonstrated by a PGP field, related toprive/objets/contenu/auteur.html and ecrire/inc/texte_mini.php.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
